columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient for this received document.

columns.name: DOC_SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: Source organization record for this document

columns.name: DOC_SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: DOC_SET
columns.description: Specifies the Set ID for these documents.

columns.name: ENC_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: The event identifier for the event contained in this document.  Applies only to Encounter Summary records.

columns.name: AUTHOR_INST_ID
columns.description: Specifies the Author Institution that created the document.

columns.name: AUTHOR_INST_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: REPOSITORY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the repository holding the received document.

columns.name: INVLD_INSTANT_TM
columns.description: This item stores the instant this received document was invalidated.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME
columns.description: Stores the file name for the document on the BLOB server

columns.name: SENDER_REFERRALID
columns.description: This item stores the referral ID for Care Everywhere Referral-type external document records as received from the outside organization. The format is OID^ID, where the ID is usually a record ID at the outside organization.

columns.name: PHR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pharmacy that sent this received document.

columns.name: DOC_CONTENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the content type of the document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXTERNAL_EPT_CSN
columns.description: For received documents from external systems that Epic rehosts, this stores the patient encounter Contact Serial Number (CSN).

columns.name: ATTACHED_DOC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the document record, which contains the attached document that was received.

columns.name: EPISODE_UUID
columns.description: Stores a UUID identifying an episode of care

columns.name: RECORD_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record state category ID for this received document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Invalid

columns.name: DOC_EPSD_IDENT
columns.description: The episode identifier of the episode contained in this document.

columns.name: INVLD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that invalidated this received document.

columns.name: DOC_CONTENT_TYPE
columns.description: This is the type of document stored in the record. For Care Everywhere Encounter Summaries, this is the type of encounter stored in this record.

columns.name: CAN_HAVE_RESTRICTED_ENC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if this Event List row could have restricted encounters


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EXT_MED_PBM_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the PBM ID for the patient.

columns.name: RECEIVED_CLINICAL_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the note record automatically created in the local chart from the received clinical note information.

columns.name: RX_DOCUMENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the status of a prescription document as it is being processed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Linked to Patient


Pending Order Entry


Processed


Deleted
